sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Menstrual Products Donor Immunity Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Menstrual Products Donor Immunity Act.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Nonprofit organization immunity from liability
sections.text: A nonprofit organization that in good faith receives menstrual products for distribution without fee or compensation and reasonably inspects the menstrual product at the time of donation and finds the menstrual product apparently usable for humans shal

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
